text: Andreas Wieland (born 16 August 1983) is a former Austrian footballer. He played as a forward. Now he is football manager of K Beerschot VA. ==Career== Wieland played in different clubs in Austrias lower leagues. His highest engagement was with SC Siebenbrunn in the Second League. ==Manager== Between 2010 and 2015 he managed teams of the SKN St. Pölten Academy. Until 2017 he was assistant coach of the Austrian U17 and U18 national teams. Between 2019 and 2021 he coached FC Juniors OÖ - the farmteam of LASK. In the 2019–20 season he was assistant coach for LASK, as well as in 2021 under Dominik Thalhammer. Wieland became manager of Beerschot in 2022. title: Andreas Wieland
